body_html: You're mixing up the types and in the first case the assigned gradient will be a FloatTensor instead of a DoubleTensor, so once you try to accumulate it into x it will likely blow up. But it's worth adding checks to raise errors earlier.
body_text: You're mixing up the types and in the first case the assigned gradient will be a FloatTensor instead of a DoubleTensor, so once you try to accumulate it into x it will likely blow up. But it's worth adding checks to raise errors earlier.
body: You're mixing up the types and in the first case the assigned gradient will be a `FloatTensor` instead of a `DoubleTensor`, so once you try to accumulate it into `x` it will likely blow up. But it's worth adding checks to raise errors earlier.
